calculateHorizontalSpeed(float, float) - Method in class projectiles.Projectile
This is a helper method to calculate the horizontal speed of a projectile for the diagonal speed to be consistent with ARROW_SPEED no matter the slope.
canMoveHere(float, float, float, float, int[][]) - Static method in class utils.HelperMethods
Checks whether an entity is able to move in a given direction, by checking every corner of the entities hitbox for a collision with another sprite.
canSeePlayer(int[][], Player) - Method in class entities.Enemy
Check if the player is within eyesight and clear line of sight.

checkEnemyHit(Enemy) - Method in class projectiles.ProjectileManager
Check if a certain Enemy (doesn't matter the type) collides with any projectile in the ProjectileMnager.
checkHit(Player) - Method in class entities.Enemy
This will check if this enemy's attack box intersects with the players hitbox.
checkOnLava() - Method in class entities.Player
This is a helper method to check if the player is currently standing on a lava tile.
